name: Koffing

evolution.description: Koffing can evolve into Weezing at level 9 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 9 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Poison Gas Pokémon. In hot places, its internal gases could expand and explode without any warning. Be very careful!

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to ground moves.
